In foundit66's recent Harry Potter thread this got my attention:
 
 He notes passages in the Bible that talk of the dire consequences for those who practice "magic arts."
 
 http://www.4forums.com/political/religion-debates/13119-divide-among-christians-latest-harry-potter-film.html
 
 So I am wondering what are these passages?
 
 Do they really contain the words magic arts?

Divination, magic & occultic activity in the Bible
 
 No doubt our resident fundies will claim this to be an atheist source, but it does summarise the Biblical passages dealing with magical practices, and as ever the situation is more complex than that, not least because ancient Hebrew has quite a lot of words with uncertain meanings.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Magic Arts?
